cascade.text: i am still confused as to why these "highly trained" individuals left their id in the getaway car. #charliehebdo
@juliamacfarlane maybe they want to get caught
@juliamacfarlane I think they ultimately want their day in court and a platform upon which the world will look.
@juliamacfarlane +1
@juliamacfarlane In one respect; part of me hopes they give the French armed police a legitimate reason.....
.@juliamacfarlane "Highly trained" by secret services…
@juliamacfarlane The two left the ID of an probably innocent 18 yr old to try to put the Police off their track.
@juliamacfarlane A "highly trained" member of my troop lost a pair of >£2000 night vision goggles once.
@juliamacfarlane @fattysaid Really? Is that confirmed?
@juliamacfarlane Well.... http://t.co/0SDPHO1zJM
@juliamacfarlane @AmericaHipple Maybe they were convinced they would die? Just guessing
@juliamacfarlane @dangillmor classic misdirection. Probably seals or MI6.
@juliamacfarlane As they say, smartest criminals make mistakes too!
@juliamacfarlane @dangillmor Unless you've got military experience, its hard to understand how much stress your brain undergoes in battle.
@juliamacfarlane @dandrezner Highly trained doesn't necessarily mean always smart.
@juliamacfarlane @petedavo_world Maybe the gunmen were better trained than the getaway driver? #weakestlink
@juliamacfarlane @AmericaHipple video also shows them using some not so great skills in the street (crossing each other's line of fire, etc)
@juliamacfarlane @auddin76 I suspect they were rather distracted. Can't think why...
@juliamacfarlane don't ask too many questions someone might accuse you of being a journalist
@juliamacfarlane how about the story that friends of the third suspect Hamyd saw him in class 230km away during the attack
@copiesofcopies @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor you can't be serious
@amuse OK. But why precisely an ID, why not Seresta tablets? @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor
@hussain_aadil @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor it is not inconceivable that the terrorists were on anti-anxiety meds AND were amp'd.
@fangbreaker i could be, but I'm not. @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor
@copiesofcopies @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor sometimes it's hard to tell
@amuse @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor These men were clearly military trained...
@Techpaste @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor the bullet groupings were super tight for automatic fire...
@amuse @juliamacfarlane @dangillmor exactly. Something which isn't achieved through a day at the shooting range...
